column4: hello i am having difficulty with a shard lib that is not installed libstdc++-libc6.2-2.so.3 does this mean anything to anyone?
> strange, I can find it in synaptic
> the package you need to install is libstdc++6
> maybe googling the file could help
you could also try ffmpeg, though it might be a bit overkill
just install mplayer and be done with it
then it should tell you the needed codec,
try running it from the command line,   mplayer /path/to/file.avi
please give the url of the paste
those are bin only codecs that are not in the official repos
